text: "You're My Best Friend" is a 1976 song by British band Queen and taken from their fourth studio album A Night at the Opera. It went to number 2 in Canada, number 3 in Ireland, number 6 in the Netherlands, number 7 in the United Kingdom and number 16 in the United States. It has been featured in numerous tv shows and movies. == References == Category:1976 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Queen (band) songs
title: You're My Best Friend (Queen song)
